content.title: Special Relativity
content.statement: Special Relativity is a fundamental concept in science physics that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Special Relativity helps build foundational knowledge in this domain.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Special Relativity include the core principles and their practical applications.
explanation.technical_details: Technical implementation involves applying the core principles of Special Relativity to real-world scenarios.
